node.excerpt: img University leaders announced in a campus email Thursday that all Summer 2020 courses (Maymester, Summer I and Summer II) will be delivered only through remote instruction to continue to mitigate the spread of COVID-19 based on guidance from the UNC System Office. “Making the decision to transition summer courses to remote instruction will help professors get ahead on developing effective…
